body.p: Replaces all referenced fragments (@keyref, @conref, or @conkeyref) in the current document with the content. Attributes are preserved according to the following priority:Attributes from the elements in the current document that reference other content are preserved except for attributes with a -dita-use-conref-target value.Attributes from the referenced content are brought into the replaced elements in the current document except for @id attributes.For keyrefs inside <xref> or <link> elements, the @keyref attribute is changed to an @href attribute, while the rest of the content for the keyref is replaced with its source content.If the source content includes references to other topics/resources (hrefs), the operation also resolves those references relative to the new location.
